content: आकांक्ष् {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To desire, long or wish for, expect; प्रत्याश्वसंतं रिपुराचकांक्ष <ls>R. 7. 47</ls>, <ls n="R.">5. 38</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 162</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">10. 121</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 153</ls>; <ls>Me. 91.</ls> {@--2@} To try to reach a place, turn to; <ls>Ms. 3. 258.</ls> {@--3@} To require, need. {@--4@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) To require some word or words to be supplied for the completion of the sense; see आकांक्षा below.
